notes.title: Institutional Review Board Statement
notes.p: This study was reviewed and approved by the Ethics Committee Faculty of Medicine of the University Malaya (Ethic No 988.11, 24 April 2014) and the safety issues for the repellent used were fully considered. All participating individuals consented to take part with their own free will and were free to withdraw from the study at any point in time without assigning any reason whatsoever.
